Description: Pierro escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterian Sea with Marianne, a girl, who is chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead a unortodox live, always on the run.

Good site on Godard: www.sensesofcinema.com/contents/directors/03/godard.html
